title: ping spikes
body:
my ping is normal 33 but the past week or so it has been having spikes of 300 every 2-3 mins, the ping is only bad on league not any other game i play.
  any advice?

replies.body:
The connection guide is always a great first step. If the solutions inside the guide cause no change, you'll want to reach out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

With that ticket, you'll want to attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and the URL to a completed [Network Analysis.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1) You'll also want to run a set of traceroutes using either [our guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) or by running [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) for 5 minutes with the IP address 192.64.170.1 and exporting your results as a text.

With those logs attached to your ticket submission, our techs will be able to work with you to resolve this quickly. Let me know if you have any questions.
